name: Save the Lamb
description: Save the Lamb - is a hardcore 2D platformer with elements of survival. Imagine that you are a sheep, which in some unthinkable way you have an opportunity to escape from your farm. Of course we can not miss the opportunity.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10 Processor: 1.2 Ghz+ Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: 500MB DirectX: Version 6.0 Storage: 170 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 1 GB DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 250 MB available space
